nodes.text: The Dearic Cantina was a cantina inthe city of Dearic, on the planet Talus.
Mort was a regular there. Other patrons were Nurla Slinthiss, the Selonian Kathikiis Ruwahurr, Corellian Engineering Corporation employee Thom Steele, and Radlee Mathiss.
Among the drinks served in this cantina were Adumari beer, Lopez Softdrink, Ardees Beverage tea, milk, and imported Utozz.
After the Battle of Yavin, a group of spacer searching for the missing pilot Cal Handro met the Bothan information broker Wire for information in the cantina.
